## IFilter.filterCoeffs() method

Returns this filter's zero &amp; pole position(s). The result object can then be passed to [filterResponse](./dsp.filterresponse.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
filterCoeffs(): FilterConfig;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`FilterConfig`
